p: Interesting and rare 1,2,4-trioxolanes ( 142 and 143) were derived from natural two allobetulin derivatives; however, biological activity has not been determined [ 226]. Two 9,13-diepoxy labdane diterpenoids called amoenolide K ( 144) and its 19-acetate ( 145) were detected in the areal parts from Amphiachyris amoena [ 227], and ent-8β,12α-epidioxy-12β-hydroxylabda-9(11),13-dien-15-oic acid γ-lactone ( 146) was obtained from the aerial parts of Premna oligotricha [ 228]. Structures ( 144– 154) can be seen in Figure 9, and their biological activity is presented in Table 10.
